attributes.action: ensure that Banking Institutions which are now funded by British taxpayers withdraw from sponsoring sporting fixtures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Northern Rock since its nationalisation has been allowed to continue supporting Newcastle United and the Newcastle Falcons financially due to an 'old agreement' (Source: Wikipedia - October 2008). There has been no manifesto pledge to support individual clubs and premierships using public monies. Institutions such as Northern Rock who are now under public ownership should therefore withdraw from such sponsorship deals immediately.
